articles.author: Matthew Perrone
articles.title: US panel backs COVID-19 boosters only for elderly, high-risk - Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — An influential federal advisory panel has overwhelmingly rejected a plan to give Pfizer booster shots against COVID-19 to most Americans, but it endorsed the extra shots for those who are 65 or older or run a high risk of severe disease.
